alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 12:17PM AKST until January 13 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow, with periods of blizzard conditions and freezing rain. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions may improve briefly this afternoon, but heavy snow will resume tonight. There will be periods of freezing rain through Saturday.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
